entry.title: Unlimited covenants, was Re: CHECKSIGFROMSTACK/{Verify} BIP for Bitcoin
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around enabling covenants and the use of OP_CAT and OP_CTV opcodes. The main focus is on creating a useful recursive covenant by modifying the scriptPubkey through sighash introspection, which allows for state updates in each transition. However, in order to update a tapscript pubkey, hashing and tweaking are required, which cannot currently be performed with existing opcodes. Alternatively, data can be stored in other places in the UTXO to perform a state update. The concept of OP_TWEAK is mentioned but not clearly defined, and further clarification is requested.
